comments:
3.2RC2, using a Sun 1.4.2_08 JDK

Steps:

1. Select the letter "t" in a Java editor
2. Press F3. A dialog opens in which I am asked to select com.sun.rsasign.t or sun.security.krb5.internal.crypto.t
3. Select Cancel. An error dialog opens.
